Translations.Text: Nimen dui zhu de yaoqiu, ta dui nimen dou you suo shangci. Ruguo nimen jisuan zhenzhu de enhui, nimen buneng jiayi tongji. Ren que shi hen buyi de, que shi wang'enfuyi de.
Dangshi yi bo la xin shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi zhege difang biancheng anquan de, qiu ni shi wo he wo de zisun, yuanli ouxiang chongbai.
Wo de zhu a! Ouxiangmen que yi shi xuduo ren mi wu. Shui shuncong wo, ta que shi wo de tongdao; shui weikang wo, namo, ni shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

Women de zhu a! Wo que yi shi wo de bufen houyi zhu zai yige meiyou zhuangjia de shangu li, zhu zai ni de jin fang fujin——women de zhu a!——Yibian tamen jin shou bai gong, qiu ni shi yibufen ren de xin yilian tamen, qiu ni yi yibufen guoshi gongji tamen, yibian tamen ganxie.
Women de zhu a! Ni biding zhidao women suo yinhui de he women suo biaobai de. Tiandi jian meiyou shenme shiwu neng manguo zhenzhu.
Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta zai wo laomai de shihou, shangci wo yi sima yi he yi si ha ge. Wo de zhu que shi tingqu qi chou de.
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo he yibufen houyi jin shou bai gong. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni jieshou wo de qi chou.
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zai qingsuan shixian zhi ri raoshu wo he wo de shuangqin he xinshimen.'
Ni jue buyao yiwei zhenzhu hushi buyi zhe de xingwei, ta zhi dui tamen huanxing dao dengyan de rizi,
